channel.title: [PI] Auto add object every 30 minutes?

item.title: [PI] Auto add object every 30 minutes?
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

First of all,

In the world of RuneScape Private Servers, An object and an item are two completely different things. You want to add an item every 30 minutes not an object.

And for PI, If youâ€™re looking for the correct method which calls upon your ItemAssistant class then in your client class search this

And use whichever method returns itemAssistant.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Auto add object every 30 minutes?
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

i did this

	public void mymessage() {
			EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(
				    new Event() {
				        public void execute(EventContainer c) {
				            sendMessage("@red@ Free gold every 30 minutes!");
				            sendMessage("@red@ Enjoy your free gold!");
				c.getItems().addItem(2412, 1);
				        }
				    }, 10000); // change the timer if u want
				};

it couldnt find the c.getItems method??? help what should i put? I want to make it give u 100k gold.

Read full topic
